column3: A bunch of these are being done in #22511.
Probably easiest to point out the few additional typos in that PR. Then we can just backport 2 commits.
> Probably easiest to point out the few additional typos in that PR. Then we can just backport 2 commits.\n\nAgree. Also https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22511#issuecomment-884803754
Most of these suggestions aren't in the current version of #22511 and that PR is about something else.  But ok :man_shrugging:

There's enough overlap to combine them into one, and some of the changes here were already pointed out in a comment in that PR. Some of the changes here are also not correct. i.e the sig files are called `noncodesigned.SHA256SUMS`, so updating the error messages to call them `non-codesigned.SHA256SUMS` is not right.
